Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.DiscoveryServiceCallback
    The use of this callback is deprecated. The Inbox is able to deal with updates. Incremental discovery should be handled internally by each DiscoveryService.
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.ExtendedDiscoveryService
    The implementation of DiscoveryServiceCallback caused a cyclic dependency and will be removed in future versions. Please see the deprecation documentation on DiscoveryServiceCallback for more details.
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.UpnpDiscoveryParticipant
    use org.openhab.core.config.discovery.upnp.UpnpDiscoveryParticipant instead.
    org.openhab.core.io.net.http.TrustManagerProvider
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mdns.discovery.MDNSDiscoveryParticipant
    use org.openhab.core.config.discovery.mdns.MDNSDiscoveryParticipant instead.
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.sslcontext.SSLContextProvider
    org.openhab.core.items.ActiveItem
    This class is not meant as a public API - it should only be used internally from within the framework
    org.openhab.core.types.StateDescriptionProvider
    Use StateDescriptionFragmentProvider instead and provide only the known fields.
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.inbox.InboxFilterCriteria
    use InboxPredicates to filter on streams of DiscoveryResults
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.sslcontext.AcceptAllCertificatesSSLContext
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.sslcontext.CustomSSLContextProvider
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnectionConfig.retainMessages
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.openhab.core.config.core.ConfigOptionProvider.getParameterOptions​(URI, String, Locale)
    Use ConfigOptionProvider.getParameterOptions(java.net.URI,java.lang.String,@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable java.util.Locale) with context instead.
    org.openhab.core.config.core.Configuration.get​(Object)
    Use Configuration.get(String) instead.
    org.openhab.core.config.core.Configuration.remove​(Object)
    Use Configuration.remove(String) instead.
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.DiscoveryListener.removeOlderResults​(DiscoveryService, long, Collection<ThingTypeUID>)
    use DiscoveryListener.removeOlderResults(DiscoveryService, long, Collection, ThingUID) instead
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.DiscoveryServiceCallback.getExistingDiscoveryResult​(ThingUID)
    Will always return null.
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.DiscoveryServiceCallback.getExistingThing​(ThingUID)
    Will always return null.
    org.openhab.core.config.discovery.inbox.Inbox.get​(InboxFilterCriteria)
    use InboxPredicates to filter on streams of DiscoveryResults
    org.openhab.core.io.net.http.HttpClientFactory.createHttpClient​(String, String)
    org.openhab.core.io.net.http.WebSocketFactory.createWebSocketClient​(String, String)
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnection.getSSLContextProvider()
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnection.isRetain()
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnection.publish​(String, byte[], MqttActionCallback)
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnection.setPersistencePath​(Path)
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnection.setRetain​(boolean)
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnection.setSSLContextProvider​(SSLContextProvider)
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttException.getReasonCode()
    org.openhab.core.items.ItemRegistry.newItemBuilder​(Item)
    Use the ItemBuilderFactory service instead.
    org.openhab.core.items.ItemUtil.convertToAcceptedState​(State, Item)
    use DS service ItemStateConverter.convertToAcceptedState(State, Item) instead.
    org.openhab.core.library.types.DateTimeType.getCalendar()
    The method is deprecated. You can use DateTimeType.getZonedDateTime() instead.
    org.openhab.core.net.NetUtil.getBroadcastAddress()
    Please use the NetworkAddressService with NetUtil.getConfiguredBroadcastAddress() Get the first candidate for a broadcast address
    org.openhab.core.net.NetUtil.getLocalIpv4HostAddress()
    Please use the NetworkAddressService with NetUtil.getPrimaryIpv4HostAddress() Get the first candidate for a local IPv4 host address (non loopback, non localhost).
    org.openhab.core.persistence.FilterCriteria.getBeginDate()
    Please use FilterCriteria.getBeginDateZoned() method which returns Java 8's ZonedDateTime. ZonedDateTime allows additional methods about time and time zone to be added for more specific filter queries.
    org.openhab.core.persistence.FilterCriteria.getEndDate()
    Please use FilterCriteria.getEndDateZoned() method which returns Java 8's ZonedDateTime. ZonedDateTime allows additional methods about time and time zone to be added for more specific filter queries.
    org.openhab.core.persistence.FilterCriteria.setBeginDate​(Date)
    Please use the FilterCriteria.setBeginDate(ZonedDateTime) method which takes Java 8's ZonedDateTime as a parameter. The Date object will be converted to a ZonedDateTime using the default time zone. ZonedDateTime allows additional methods about time and time zone to be added for more specific filter queries.
    org.openhab.core.persistence.FilterCriteria.setEndDate​(Date)
    Please use the FilterCriteria.setEndDate(ZonedDateTime) method which takes Java 8's ZonedDateTime as a parameter. The Date object will be converted to a ZonedDateTime using the default time zone. ZonedDateTime allows additional methods about time and time zone to be added for more specific filter queries.
    org.openhab.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler.handleUpdate​(ChannelUID, State)
    org.openhab.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler.initialize()
    org.openhab.core.thing.binding.ThingHandler.handleUpdate​(ChannelUID, State)
    in favor of using a "slave" profile. Will be removed before a 1.0 release. Bindings must not implement this method!
    org.openhab.core.thing.ThingUID.getThingTypeId()
    use Thing.getThingTypeUID() instead.
    org.openhab.core.thing.ThingUID.getThingTypeUID()
    use Thing.getThingTypeUID() instead.
    org.openhab.core.thing.type.ChannelTypeProvider.getChannelGroupType​(ChannelGroupTypeUID, Locale)
    The ChannelGroupTypeProvider is now to be implemented/used instead.
    org.openhab.core.thing.type.ChannelTypeProvider.getChannelGroupTypes​(Locale)
    The ChannelGroupTypeProvider is now to be implemented/used instead.
    org.openhab.core.thing.UID.getSegments()
    use UID.getAllSegments() instead
    org.openhab.core.thing.util.ThingHelper.ensureUnique​(Collection<Channel>)
    Use ThingHelper.ensureUniqueChannels(Collection) instead.
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.openhab.core.config.core.ConfigDescription​(URI)
    Use the ConfigDescriptionBuilder instead.
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttBrokerConnection​(MqttBrokerConnection.Protocol, String, Integer, boolean, String)
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.MqttException​(int)
    org.openhab.core.io.transport.mqtt.ssl.CustomTrustManagerFactory​(SSLContextProvider)
    org.openhab.core.library.types.DateTimeType​(Calendar)
    The constructor uses Calendar object hence it doesn't store time zone. A new constructor is available. Use DateTimeType(ZonedDateTime) instead.
    org.openhab.core.library.types.RawType()
    org.openhab.core.thing.Channel​(ChannelUID, String)
    - use ChannelBuilder instead
    org.openhab.core.thing.ChannelUID​(ThingTypeUID, ThingUID, String)
    org.openhab.core.thing.type.BridgeType​(String, String, String)
    Use ThingTypeBuilder.buildBridge() instead.
    org.openhab.core.thing.type.ChannelDefinition​(String, ChannelTypeUID)
    use the builder
    org.openhab.core.thing.type.ChannelGroupType​(ChannelGroupTypeUID, boolean, String, String, List<ChannelDefinition>)
    Use the ChannelGroupTypeBuilder instead.
    org.openhab.core.thing.type.ChannelType​(ChannelTypeUID, boolean, String, String, String, String, Set<String>, StateDescription, URI)
    Use the ChannelTypeBuilder instead.
    org.openhab.core.thing.type.ThingType​(String, String, String)
    Use the ThingTypeBuilder instead.
    org.openhab.core.types.StateDescription​(BigDecimal, BigDecimal, BigDecimal, String, boolean, List<StateOption>)
    use StateDescriptionFragmentBuilder instead.
